com.defano.jmonet.tools.util

Interface MarchingAntsObserver

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractSelectionTool, AbstractTransformTool, LassoTool, PerspectiveTool, ProjectionTool, RotateTool, RubberSheetTool, ScaleTool, SelectionTool, SlantTool

    public interface MarchingAntsObserver
    An observer of movement of the ants (i.e., change in dashed line phase)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onAntsMoved(Stroke newAntsStroke)
      Called to indicate that ants have "marched" (the dotted line stroke phase has changed) and that observers should re-paint using the stroke provided.

    • Method Detail

      • onAntsMoved

        void onAntsMoved(Stroke newAntsStroke)
        Called to indicate that ants have "marched" (the dotted line stroke phase has changed) and that observers should re-paint using the stroke provided.
        Parameters:
        newAntsStroke - The new paint stroke to re-draw.
